addons.name: Class Blogs
addons.description: Allow every class to have a blog of its own. You can have as many class blogs as you like.

addons.name: Emergency Alerts
addons.description: Snow closure? Emergency Alerts allow you to share this and other important messages effectively.

addons.name: Secure Areas
addons.description: Have secure pages which only certain users may access. Ideal for teachers and/or governors.

addons.name: Photo Gallery
addons.description: Share photos in an organised gallery which your website visitors can access simply and easily.
